attributes.action: Allow parents to stay at home to look after their children and not force them to work and leave them with childminders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have human rights as a parent to stay at home and look after our children rather than be forced out to work because of circumstances beyond our control that left us alone with them.  Children deserve to have a childhood with parents, not be sent to child minders and clubs, this should be a choice not a necessity
